Direct Known Subclasses:
RoadGraph
public class PlanarGraph
extends java.lang.Object

A directed graph which can be embedded in a planar surface.

remove

public void remove(Edge edge)
Remove an edge and its associated DirectedEdges from the graph. Note: this method does not remove the nodes associated with the edge, even if the removal of the edge reduces the degree of a node to zero.
Parameters:
edge - the edge to remove
